result.title: ABOUT CODEFORCES
result.content: It's a brilliant site for all level of programmers. Starting from newbie to professional it is a complete site for all. So, thanks to them who were related to this OJ's establishment and development. Kudos to them who are working on preparing standard problems and more upgradation of the site. THANK YOU ALL. Can a feature be added to this? rating change based on problem solving
